name: Soutien Belge Overseas
goal:
Soutien Belge Overseas is a non-government, non-profit organisation dedicated to providing essential humanitarian aid, education and psychological support to populations displaced by conflict in Lebanon, Turkey and Syria. Our projects in the Middle East include schools and training centres for women and child refugees. We also organize regular collections of emergency aid donations for delivery to the most deprived areas in Middle Eastern countries. At a local level in Brussels, we deliver activities and civic engagement programs to help asylum seekers, refugee children and vulnerable youth integrate and find their place in the community.

We are founded on the philosophy of providing assistance without discrimination or reference towards any political or religious affiliation.
interests: Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives:
• EU comprehensive strategy, EU regional strategy for Syria, EU resilience agenda, EU agenda on migration
• migration and development
• migration and integration
• migration and local economic development
• Social policies affecting migrants and refugees: employment, education, housing, youth, humanitarian aid
• coping with humanitarian emergencies in the Middle East
• AMIF funding programme and other EU funding relevant to the above issues
